summary: Have you ever wanted to live in a dungeon and liked shriekwind bastion as a place. Then this is the mod for you. it adds a couple of necessities for a player home. W.I.P
descriptionHtml:
Have you ever wanted to live in a dungeon and liked shriekwind bastion as a place. Then this is the mod for you. it adds a couple of necessities for a player home. W.I.P
[img]http://img3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20111206153053/elderscrolls/images/0/06/South_Shriekwind_Bastion.jpg[/img]

Features
This mod currently only has 4 features:

[b]Guildroom
[/b]The room for gathering your followers and such.

[b]Living quarters
[/b]here is where the followers sleep, dine and craft. there are 7 beds, 2 tables, an alchemy lab, an enchantingstation, a forge, a tanning rack, a workbench and a grindstone

[b]Storage
[/b]There is a small storage place further into the jungle, with 3 additional beds.

[b]Player room
[/b]There is a player home part with a bed, some benches, a fire and somehow alot of shoes.

[b]Where?[/b]
If you enter from the north entrance you will find the guild room to your right, than you will enter the living quarters, than storage room. just go further until you get to the player room

[b]If you would like some things being put into the mod just leave a comment and ill look into it[/b]

the wiki page can be found at http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Shriekwind_Bastion
i reccomend the guildstarter mod http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52871/?
author: Lexthatguy
